original_text: I have a baptism to be baptized with, and how great is my distress until it is accomplished!
korean_text: 나는 받을 세례가 있으니 그것이 이루어지기까지 나의 답답함이 어떠하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: I have a baptism to be baptized with
and how great is my distress until it is accomplished!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 이루어질 때까지 내가 얼마나 괴로운지!
